revised_title: Epidemiology and Genetics in Coevolution of Parasites and Hosts
tldr: This article explores the relationship between epidemiology and genetics in the coevolution of parasites and hosts. It discusses the impact of parasites on host populations and the role of virulence and transmissibility in the coevolutionary process. The study combines mathematical models and empirical evidence to understand the complex interactions between parasites and their hosts.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Ecology and Evolution
